# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 10 offset_listposy = 20 offset_listwidth = 10 offset_listheight = 30 offset_textwidth = 30 offset_textheight = 20 min_width = 280 min_height = 93 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 31 else: offset = 21 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 12 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx * 11 wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizey > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 12 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2))
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 10 offset_listposy = 90 offset_listwidth = 10 offset_listheight = 30 offset_textwidth = 50 offset_textheight = 20 min_width = 400 min_height = 93 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 101 else: offset = 93 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 12 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx * 11 wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizey > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 12 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2))
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 10 offset_listposy = 90 offset_listwidth = 10 offset_listheight = 30 offset_textwidth = 170 offset_textheight = 20 min_width = 400 min_height = 50 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 21 else: offset = 13 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2))

# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
